title: Water Borne (Halcyon Romance Series Book 3)
features: No curse can keep him from his mate. No ocean, either.

Mermayde Essa has never dared to walk on human legs. Until she crosses paths with the darkly alluring winged male Nazrin, her enemy. Or is he?Cursed by a damning prophecy, Wind Borne Nazrin traded his life for his bonded mate's. Now, he'll surrender everything for one chance at a future together. When their two worlds collide, not even the Fates can keep him from her.
The gods are at war, and

are the prize... Descended from the Greek gods, these fierce warriors have battled every kind of monster--except the darkness within themselves. And the only way to conquer this foe is through absolute surrender--to each other.If you love fiery heroines, devastating heroes, and riveting, action-packed tales of true love that keep you up all night, don't miss out on this steamy and addictive series.
description: ...it had a hint of The Little Mermaid, but it's so much better than that! Nazrin is so easy to love, and watching him, knowing that the Wind Borne don't even have a word for it, fall in love with Essa makes it all the better."
I'm happy to return to Halcyon. I love this series and this was a great installment!
...This book grabbed me right from the start and never let me go.

bestselling author Rachael Slate writes sizzling shifter stories where alpha heroes battle the beasts within themselves and sassy heroines would rather leave them wild than tame them. Whether dragons or centaurs, it's always scorching hot romance. When not writing, Rachael can be found in nature, soaking up inspiration, or baking far too many sweet treats in the kitchen. She's obsessed with mythology, travel, and exploring other cultures, including her husband's Chinese-Malaysian heritage, which inspired her Chinese Zodiac Romance series.Rachael Slate resides on the West Coast of Canada in her own little blended world, with her husband, two children, cat, and dog. Her kids have asked for a horse, but that's still up for debate.To learn more about Rachael Slate, visit her website at rachaelslate.com. For free reads, exclusive content, giveaways, and to be notified about upcoming releases, sign up for her newsletter at rachaelslate.com/newsletter. Rachael would love to hear from you!
